synopsis.text: Though she's spent most of her life as an only child, Ema Hinata's world turns upside down when her adventurous father remarries the successful fashion designer, Miwa Asahina. To give the couple some space, Ema moves into the Sunrise Residence, where she discovers her new family includes not one, but thirteen brothers! As they all live together under one roof, Ema experiences the joys and challenges of being part of a large family. However, as time passes, she realizes that the feelings developing between her and her new brothers extend beyond mere sibling affection. Will Ema be able to navigate this complex web of emotions and find her own happily ever after?
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
